entries.title: Disgraced crypto founder says he’s not on the run. But no one knows where he is.
entries.description: Interpol could soon be looking for Do Kwon, the man behind recently cratered currencies Terra and Luna.

entries.title: A landmark Supreme Court fight over social media now looks likely
entries.description: The stakes are high because of the increasingly dominate role platforms such as Twitter and Facebook play in American democracy and elections.

entries.title: ‘Valorant’ partnership turmoil clouds Optic’s future, yay says
entries.description: "Even if we want to stick together, there’s a chance that buyouts might not work out [and] we may end up splitting up," said Jaccob ‘yay’ Whiteaker.

entries.title: ‘Return to Monkey Island’ is a swansong for golden age adventure games
entries.description: "Return to Monkey Island" is a nostalgic, forward-looking sequel from original series creator Ron Gilbert and a love letter for golden age adventure games.
